posts.post_text: February 29, 2020 at 9:49 AM#2Hi,You can halfspeed the executor where the BPM master is located. This will result in a smaller range though. Syntax:CodeHalfSpeed Executor x.xAn other option is to set a rate per effect or a ratemaster. Check the following link for that:https://help2.malighting.com/Page/grandMA2/…ter_rate/en/3.8Kind regards,Floris DijkersLighting Director & Designerflorisdijkers.comlighting@florisdijkers.com
